title: Ep. - 389 - ANEESA FERREIRA FROM THE CHALLENGE AND THE REAL WORLD DIRECTOR OF BOB ROSS DOCUMENTARY
description:
Aneesa Ferreira from MTV’s The Real World: Chicago and The Challenge: Spies, Lies and Allies

discuss how reality tv changed the trajectory of her life, filming The Real World during 9/11, and behind the scenes of The Challenge.

 

Joshua Rofe, Director of Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed, a documentary on Netflix brings us the shockingly untold story of the prolific landscape artist and host of The Joy of Painting.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Tik Tok: http://www.tiktok.com/itskatecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey 

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey

 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
